presentation.title: Presentation
paragraphs: Global Expertise, Local Impact. Since 2008, J&A Automation has been transforming industries through advanced automation solutions. With a presence in 30+ countries and partnerships with global leaders, we engineer efficiency, safety, and innovation for tomorrow's factories

Founded in 2008 by a group of engineers from multinational companies in the automotive and aviation sectors, J&A Automation was born with a clear mission: to deliver world-class automation and maintenance projects.

From our early days developing PLC and HMI solutions, we expanded into robotics, BIW projects, simulation, and virtual commissioning, becoming a trusted partner for industries that cannot afford downtime.

Today, J&A Automation operates in 30 countries, with projects delivered in the Americas, Europe, Africa, and Asia. Our portfolio includes collaborations with industry giants such as Tesla, GM, Coca-Cola, Heineken, FEMSA, Paulaner, and many others.

With multilingual teams fluent in English, German, and Spanish, and direct training with manufacturers like Siemens, Rockwell, Mitsubishi, Atlas Copco, and RedLion, we ensure world-class standards adapted to local needs.

projects.title: Our Projects
projects.intro: At J&A Automation, every project is designed with one goal: to solve real industrial challenges. From PLC & HMI programming to robotics, BIW projects, simulation, and virtual commissioning, our solutions deliver measurable improvements in efficiency, safety, and cost reduction.
items: Over the past 15+ years, we have successfully executed projects across automotive, aviation, bottling, and consumer goods industries, partnering with global leaders such as Tesla, GM, Coca-Cola, Heineken, FEMSA, and Paulaner.

Our portfolio includes battery line integrations, robotic body shops, bottling line optimizations, and virtual commissioning programs ‚Äî each one tailored to meet the specific demands of high-performance production lines.

With presence in 30 countries and a team trained directly with manufacturers like Siemens, Rockwell, and Mitsubishi, J&A Automation ensures that every project is more than an installation ‚Äî it's a strategic solution for sustainable growth.

helpdesk.paragraph: Thinking about minimizing response time in maintenance emergencies, it has a Help Desk sector, where it operates online on the customer's PLC for rapid fault diagnosis.

projectsCarousel.title: Cases
projectsCarousel.description: Manufacturers and bottlers of beverages and food rely on J&A Automation and report on their experiences with our automation lines. Find out first-hand when there are new machine and plant solutions for the beverage and food industry.

servicesPage.title: Industrial Automation Solutions
servicesPage.subtitle: Cutting-edge technology and technical expertise to optimize your industrial processes and increase productivity

plc-ihm.title: PLC and HMI Programming
plc-ihm.description: When machines stop, production loses millions. At J&A Automation, we provide expert PLC & HMI programming across Siemens, Rockwell, Mitsubishi, Omron, Panasonic, and Unitronics. Our solutions minimize downtime, ensure compliance with international safety standards, and maximize production reliability

biw.title: BIW Projects (Body in White)
biw.description: Complex BIW projects demand precision. Poor design and integration can cause costly delays in automotive lines. With over a decade of expertise, J&A Automation delivers end-to-end BIW projects, from process design to offline programming, trusted by leading automakers worldwide.

virtual-commissioning.title: Virtual Commissioning (VCx)
virtual-commissioning.description: Startup delays are costly. Traditional commissioning exposes risks too late in the process. With Virtual Commissioning (VCx), J&A Automation validates logic, robotics, and safety before installation, cutting costs and reducing time-to-market.

montagem-paineis.title: Electrical / Mechanical / Hydraulic / Pneumatic Design
montagem-paineis.description: Poor design means expensive rework. At J&A Automation, we deliver comprehensive engineering projects in electrical, mechanical, hydraulic, and pneumatic systems, ensuring safety, compliance, and seamless integration into your line.

nr12.title: Machine Adequacy to Standard NR-12
nr12.description: Adequacy of machines and equipment to work safety standards

suporte-tecnico.title: Help Desk & Remote Support
suporte-tecnico.description: Downtime doesn't wait ‚Äî neither should support. J&A Automation's Help Desk & Remote Support provides rapid online fault diagnosis directly on your PC, minimizing response time and keeping your line running.

robotic-simulation.title: Robotics & Simulation
robotic-simulation.description: Inefficient robots drain productivity. With J&A Automation‚Äôs robotic simulation and Tecnomatix expertise, we deliver optimized trajectories, cycle-time studies, and flawless offline programming to accelerate commissioning and maximize ROI.

operational-training.title: Operational Training
operational-training.description: Technology is only as strong as the people who run it. J&A Automation provides operational training directly with manufacturers, empowering your team to operate, maintain, and optimize automation systems with confidence.
